m_displayName: IOP - ARME - GLAIVE STALAKTOSS - ETHER - Glaive Déphasé

description.fr:
<if pvm>Confère {PropertyEffect:18} et {ATvalue:p, +, percent} à un de vos personnages pour le tour.</if><if pvp>{ATvalue:pPVP2, +, percent} à votre héros pour le tour s'il est déjà {PropertyEffect:18[DÉPHASÉ]}.
\---
Sinon, confère {PropertyEffect:18} et {ATvalue:pPVP, +, percent} à votre héros pour le tour.</if>
description.en:
<if pvm>Confers {PropertyEffect:18} and {ATvalue:p, +, percent} on one of your characters for the turn.</if><if pvp>{ATvalue:pPVP2, +, percent} to your hero for the turn if they are already {PropertyEffect:18[DEPHASED]}.
\---
Otherwise, confers {PropertyEffect:18} and {ATvalue:pPVP, +, percent} on your hero for the turn.</if>
description.es:
<if pvm>Confiere {PropertyEffect:18} y {ATvalue:p, +, percent} a uno de tus personajes durante el turno.</if><if pvp>{ATvalue:pPVP2, +, percent} a tu héroe durante el turno si ya está {PropertyEffect:18[DESFASADO]}.
\---
Si no, confiere {PropertyEffect:18} y {ATvalue:pPVP, +, percent} a tu héroe durante el turno.</if>
description.de:
<if pvm>Verleiht einem deiner Charaktere für die Runde {PropertyEffect:18} und {ATvalue:p, +, percent}.</if><if pvp>{ATvalue:pPVP2, +, percent} für deinen Helden für die Runde, wenn er bereits {PropertyEffect:18[PHASENVERSCHOBEN]} ist.
\---
Verleiht deinem Helden andernfalls {PropertyEffect:18} und {ATvalue:pPVP, +, percent} für die Runde.</if>
description.pt:
<if pvm>Concede {PropertyEffect:18} e {ATvalue:p, +, percent} a um dos seus personagens durante o turno.</if><if pvp>{ATvalue:pPVP2, +, percent} ao seu herói durante o turno se ele já estiver {PropertyEffect:18[DEFASADO]}.
\---
Caso contrário, concede {PropertyEffect:18} e {ATvalue:pPVP, +, percent} ao seu herói durante o turno.</if>
